item.description:
This is my first organized event for the new year. Lets meet at 6:15 to get tickets and get situated. There are concession stands available at the civic center.

Do not buy tickets until you find the group so we can all sit together! If you have difficulty finding us, please call me at the number listed at the bottom of the email.

Game Night Promotion:

01/26/2013 (Saturday Hockey Night in Portland! ) - 7 p.m. vs. Manchester Monarchs

Please contact me if you have any questions. Before night of event: 207 655-9103 or adamdesignweb@yahoo.com  Night of event: 207-482-9536
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the main lobby near the ticket booth. Wearing a Pirates Jersey.
item.name: Pirates Hockey Game
